data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Liege with the kick-off.
Goal! Duckens Nazon gives St. Truidense a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 16, Goal! Yuma Suzuki extends St. Truidense's lead to 0-2.
At Stade Maurice Dufrasne, Samuel Asamoah has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Liege's Selim Amallah has been booked in Liege.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Stade Maurice Dufrasne.
The second-half is underway. St. Truidense with the kick-off.
The home team have replaced Selim Amallah with Abdoul Tapsoba. This is the first substitution made today by Philippe Montanier.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Maxime Lestienne with Michel Ange Balikwisha.
At Stade Maurice Dufrasne, Maximiliano Caufriez is shown a red card and sent off.
Mory Konate is on a sub for Samuel Asamoah for St. Truidense.
In the minute 69, Philippe Montanier is making the team's third substitution at Stade Maurice Dufrasne with Felipe Avenatti replacing Samuel Bastien.
Hugo Siquet is replacing Nicolas Gavory for the home team.
Mory Konate (St. Truidense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 71, Goal! The home team reduce the deficit to 1-2 through a header from Jackson Muleka.
Michel Ange Balikwisha for Liege has been booked by Lothar D Hondt and receives a first yellow card.
Stefaan Van Winckel (St. Truidense) is making a second substitution, with Chris Durkin replacing Duckens Nazon.
In the minute 89, Nelson Balongo is replacing Yuma Suzuki for St. Truidense at Stade Maurice Dufrasne.
St. Truidense make their fourth substitution with Ibrahima Sory Sankhon replacing Facundo Colidio.
Lothar D Hondt blows to end the match. The final score is 1-2.
